original_text: not that anyone has seen the Father except he who is from God; he has seen the Father.
korean_text: 이는 아버지를 본 자가 있다는 것이 아니니라 오직 하나님에게서 온 자만 아버지를 보았느니라

sentences.original_text: not that anyone has seen the Father
sentences.korean_translation: 누구도 아버지를 본 사람이 없다는 것이 아니라

sentences.original_text: except he who is from God
